Module roborally
Package server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
This class mainly deals with establishing connection between server and client and helps in communication between different users.
Author:
Louis, amulya, janau

    • setPort

      public void setPort​(int port)

    • run

      public void run()
      It opens a channel for the connection between Server and Client, and picks the message from the blocking queue in the order they are received.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • isMessageValid

      private boolean isMessageValid​(QueueMessage queueMessage)
      checks if a received json message is valid, that means if the ServerState allows the message at this point
      Parameters:
      queueMessage - received Object of JSONMessage
      Returns:
      boolean true if the message is valid at this point in the game/serverState

    • handleMessage

      private void handleMessage​(QueueMessage queueMessage)
      Based on the messageType the various protocol are differentiated and Object class type is casted down to respective class.
      Parameters:
      queueMessage - received Object of JSONMessage

    • cheat

      private void cheat​(SendChat sc, User user)
      determines if the message is a cheat or not
      Parameters:
      sc - the received Chat protocol
      user - the user who sent the chat

    • addPlayerValues

      private void addPlayerValues​(User user, PlayerValues pv)
      Parameters:
      user - is the current player
      pv - is the type of protocol message which is handled

    • addNewUser

      private void addNewUser​(User user, HelloServer hs)
      Parameters:
      user - is the current player
      hs - is the type of protocol message which is handled

    • dealWithMap

      private void dealWithMap​(User user, SetStatus status)
      This method sends the SelectMap protocol message to the first user who presses ready. If the same player presses unready, then the SelectMap protocol message is sent to the next player in the playersList. If all users are AIs, a random map is selected. In addition to that, it calls the play method from the Game to start the game
      Parameters:
      user - is the current player
      status - is the type of protocol message which is handled

    • startAIGame

      public void startAIGame()

    • gameWon

      public void gameWon​(int winnerID)
      This method resets all the things from the server, makes ready for the new game.
      Parameters:
      winnerID - id of the player who has won the game

    • acceptClients

      private void acceptClients​(java.net.ServerSocket serverSocket)
      This method accepts the clients request and ChatServer assigns a separate thread to handle multiple clients
      Parameters:
      serverSocket - socket from which connection is to be established

    • setReadyStatus

      public boolean setReadyStatus​(User user, boolean ready)
      Adds a user to the list of ready users if they are ready, or removes them if not. It is tested, if the player was already ready/ not ready.
      Parameters:
      user - User to change the status for
      ready - true if ready, otherwise false
      Returns:
      true if all players (min. 2) are ready

    • communicateUsers

      public void communicateUsers​(JSONBody jsonBody, User sender)
      This method sends a message to each client which is connected to the server except the sender itself.
      Parameters:
      jsonBody - type of protocol message which needs to be sent.
      sender - the user who is responsible for sending the message.

    • communicateAll

      public void communicateAll​(JSONBody jsonBody)
      This method sends the message to all the connected users.
      Parameters:
      jsonBody - type of protocol message which needs to be sent.

    • communicateDirect

      public void communicateDirect​(JSONBody jsonBody, int receiver)
      It sends the message to the particular user based on the id of the player.
      Parameters:
      jsonBody - type of protocol message which needs to be sent.
      receiver - id of the receiver

    • setServerController

      public void setServerController​(ServerController serverController)

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser​(User user)
      This method removes a saved user from the server and game. If no user is left on the server, the server is closed.
      Parameters:
      user - User to be removed
